Text: ERMT Incorporation DocumentsI am pleased to attach a file pdf format containing the incorporation documents for ERMT Canada Corp We will forward the name change documents as soon as the name change is completed in the morning Please let me know if you require antything further Regards Mungo Mungo HardwickeBrown Blake Cassels Graydon LLP nd Street SW Calgary Alberta TP J telephone facsimile email This email communication is confidential and legally privileged If you are not the intended recipient please notify me at the telephone number shown above or by return email and delete this communication and any copy immediately Thank you ERMTDocumentspdf

Project Redman Change of Name ResolutionAttached is a Shareholders Resolution authorizing the name change I think we have the Shareholder Name correct but if not the file is in word format and can be easily amended We are scanning the other incorporation documents and will send shortly The articles of amendment will be prepared and filed first thing tomorrow as soon as we receive confirmation that the new name is not conflicting with an existing name This is a NUANS search which has been ordered but not received yet Regards Mungo Mungo HardwickeBrown Blake Cassels Graydon LLP nd Street SW Calgary Alberta TP J telephone facsimile email This email communication is confidential and legally privileged If you are not the intended recipient please notify me at the telephone number shown above or by return email and delete this communication and any copy immediately Thank you Resolution to Change NameDOC
